This class is called "Introduction to Data Models and Inference", but let's not get crazy, this is the most basic stats course that exists at every university in the world. Topics include: 

- Sampling and Experimental Design
- Descriptive Statistics: Means, Standard Deviations, and Visuals
- Inferential Statistics: Hypothesis Testing and Confidence Intervals
- Basic Modeling : Correlation and Regression
- Basic Probability: Discrete and Continuous Random Variables
- Use of Microsoft Excel
